Job DescriptionS&P Global PlattsThe Role: GIS DeveloperThe Team:            At S&P Global Platts, we provide the insights; you make better informed trading and business decisions with confidence. We’re the leading independent provider of information and benchmark prices for the commodities and energy markets. Customers in over 150 countries look to our expertise in news, pricing and analytics to deliver greater transparency and efficiency to markets. S&P Global Platts coverage includes oil and gas, power, petrochemicals, metals, agriculture, and shipping.S&P Global Platts is a division of S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI), which provides essential intelligence for individuals, companies and governments to make decisions with confidence. For more information, visit www.platts.com
 Position SummaryWe are looking for a GIS Developer with 5 - 6 years of experience in our Hyderabad office. As a GIS Developer you will work on a global GIS Development team creating and customizing  GIS Applications for our internal GIS users in our Commodity Insights division.Required Academic & Technical Skills:Bachelors in GIS or related field, or equivalent experience, with a thorough technical knowledge of GIS, Spatial Data, Development & Database concepts.
5-6 years working experience in a GIS Developer role, with ESRI ArcGIS Enterprise, ArcGIS Pro Desktop, ArcPy, Python.
Experience in ArcGIS Web Development with working knowledge on ArcGIS JavaScript API, ArcGIS Rest API and JavaScript Development.
Knowledgeable of AWS cloud computing and deploying processes to the cloud.
Experience with Azure DevOps, Jenkins and Terraform
Experience optimizing ETL processes with a focus on usability, performance, flexibility and reliability.
Strong SQL skills required in Oracle and/or PostgreSQL.Bonus Skills:Experience using FME ETL software. Desktop and Server
AWS Cloud Certification
Experience and understanding of Energy (Oil and Gas) spatial data.Duties & ResponsibilitiesGeneral Responsibilities:Develop and customize GIS focused applications for our internal users
Create, interpret  and maintain written business requirements and technical specification documents.
Work in the Agile 3.0 Framework and Scrum Development Model
Perform quality coding to business and technical specifications.
Develop GIS based POCs to showcase ideas, prepare for demos to presenting to the business user.
Monitoring and maintenance of all components that make up the GIS Spatial Data infrastructure.About YouYou’re highly collaborative - you have an affinity for finding solutions through discussions with team members
You’re a problem solver – you enjoy solving complex problems, and are comfortable exploring them even if the problem and solution are not yet well-defined
You’re always improving something – whether it’s learning a new database, or finding better ways to do things in your team or organizationally, continuous improvement is important to you
